google-alternatives-for-huawei-devices.title: JCC Blog - Google alternatives for Huawei Devices
google-alternatives-for-huawei-devices.description: Last year, Huawei was banned/added to the US entity list for security concerns. That ban badly hurt the company because Google and other US companies had no other choice to join the bandwagon (pun unintended), so i already realized how large the impact could occur just by preventing using an ecosystem like Google, and how can I use my Huawei device for online things?
google-alternatives-for-huawei-devices.author: John Cyrill Corsanes
